description:
Test signal generator configuration.

Provides internal test signals (sine, pink noise, white noise) that can be: - Routed as input source (replaces analog/digital inputs) - Mixed into speaker channels via `user.generator_mix` parameter

Useful for system testing, alignment, and troubleshooting.

frequency.description: Sine wave frequency in Hz (range: 20.0-20000.0). Only used when kind=Sine.

gain.description: Generator output level in dB (range: -60.0 to 0.0)

hpf_freq.description: High-pass filter frequency in Hz (range: 20.0-20000.0). Optional filter.

lpf_freq.description: Low-pass filter frequency in Hz (range: 20.0-20000.0). Optional filter.
